statements: SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM network_topology;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_topology WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT * FROM network_topology WHERE device_type IN ('router', 'switch') ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_topology ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, device_id, connected_devices FROM network_topology WHERE port_number > 0;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_topology WHERE device_type = 'router' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_topology WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
SELECT device_name, device_type, connected_devices FROM network_topology WHERE jsonb_array_length(connected_devices) > 2 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_topology WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_id, device_type, port_number FROM network_topology WHERE port_number >= 4 ORDER BY device_type, port_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_topology;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM network_topology WHERE latency_ms > 50;
SELECT device_name, model, vendor FROM device_inventory WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT id, device_name, latency_ms FROM network_topology ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vendor FROM device_inventory;
SELECT * FROM network_topology;
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM network_topology WHERE latency_ms > 20 ORDER BY latency_ms DESC;
SELECT device_name, mac_address, latency_ms FROM network_topology WHERE latency_ms IS NOT NULL AND latency_ms < 50 ORDER BY latency_ms ASC;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, latency_ms FROM network_topology WHERE latency_ms <= 10 OR latency_ms >= 100 ORDER BY ip_address;
SELECT device_name, model, vendor, status FROM device_inventory WHERE vendor = 'Cisco' OR version LIKE 'IOS%' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_topology;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_topology ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_status FROM network_topology WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT * FROM device_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, connection_speed FROM network_mapping JOIN device_inventory ON network_mapping.device_id = device_inventory.id ORDER BY connection_speed DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_topology WHERE device_status = 'active';
SELECT device_name, manufacturer FROM device_inventory WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, connection_speed FROM device_inventory JOIN network_mapping ON device_inventory.id = network_mapping.device_id;
SELECT * FROM network_topology ORDER BY device_type DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_ip FROM network_topology WHERE device_type = 'router' AND device_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM network_topology;
SELECT node_name, node_type FROM network_topology ORDER BY node_type DESC;
SELECT node_name, connection_speed FROM network_topology WHERE connection_speed > 100 ORDER BY connection_speed ASC;
SELECT * FROM device_inventory WHERE location = 'Server Room';
SELECT device_name, purchase_date FROM device_inventory ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM network_topology ORDER BY node_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT node_name, node_type, connection_speed FROM network_topology WHERE connection_speed > 100 ORDER BY node_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_inventory WHERE purchase_date > '2021-01-01' AND device_type = 'Router';

SELECT connections.source_node_id, connections.destination_node_id, connections.latency, network_mapping.description FROM connections INNER JOIN network_mapping ON connections.connection_id = network_mapping.connection_id;
SELECT node_name, node_type, connection_speed FROM network_topology WHERE connection_type = 'Fiber' ORDER BY connection_speed DESC LIMIT 4;
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name DESC
SELECT * FROM NetworkConnections WHERE port_number = 80
SELECT device_name, mac_address, location FROM NetworkDevices WHERE device_type = 'Router'
SELECT device_id, manufacturer, model, serial_number FROM DeviceInventory WHERE manufacturer = 'Cisco' ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT * FROM NetworkDevices ORDER BY device_name ASC, device_type DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT device_name, ip_address, mac_address FROM NetworkDevices WHERE location = 'Server Room' OR location = 'Data Center';
SELECT device_name, device_type, manufacturer FROM NetworkDevices JOIN DeviceInventory ON NetworkDevices.device_id = DeviceInventory.device_id WHERE manufacturer = 'Cisco' AND model = 'Catalyst';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_devices, AVG(link_speed) AS avg_speed FROM NetworkConnections JOIN NetworkTopology ON NetworkConnections.connection_id = NetworkTopology.connection_id;

SELECT location_name, COUNT(device_id) AS total_devices FROM LocationMetadata LEFT JOIN NetworkDevices ON LocationMetadata.location_name = NetworkDevices.location GROUP BY location_name ORDER BY total_devices DESC;
